TITLE.P: Cryo-free dilution refrigerator with the maximum level of vibration isolation.

SHORT_DESCR.P: In order to be able to execute the ERC Project ‘Quantum Optomechanics in 3D’ properly, a cryogen-free dilution refrigerator with the maximum level of vibration isolation will be required. The device will be specially designed and built for the subsidized research and will therefore be part of the overall research. Continuous adjustments will be executed based on the research results and therefore the Cryo-free dilution fridge will be in on-going development.

The purchase concerns a Cryo-free dilution refrigerator with the maximum level of vibration isolation for Quantum Nanoscience of the TU Delft. The Cryo-free dilution refrigerator will be required in order to be able to execute the ERC Project ‘Quantum Optomechanics in 3D’ properly. The device will be specially designed and built for the subsidized research and will therefore be part of the overall research. Continuous adjustments will be executed based on the research results and therefore the Cryo-free dilution fridge will be in on-going development. Market research has shown that only one supplier is qualified for the collaboration in this research project.

D_JUSTIFICATION.P: In order to be able to execute the research proposed the ERC project ‘Quantum Optomechanics in 3D’ grated to Dr. Steele, a cryogen-free dilution refrigerator will be required with vibration levels that are significantly below what is currently available on the market.

In order to make the implementation of the ERC research possible, Dr. Steele seeks to begin a research and development project in order to co-develop an ultra-low vibration cryogen-free system for the ERC project. This research will be conducted as an active collaboration between the researchers in Delft and the supplier, with the researchers in Delft using the ultra-senstive devices developed in the ERC to characterize vibrations and provide feedback into modifications of the design that will occur during the project. The developments and results that will arise in this collaboration will form an integral part of the research in the ERC project.

Initial market research into possible collaborators for such a project led to the company BlueFors located in Helsinki. BlueFors is currently the market leader in vibration isolation, and currently offers three levels of vibration isolation in their standard product line. The highest level of vibration isolation that is offered as a standard product option by BlueFors is not yet available in the standard product line of other suppliers, making BlueFors well suited to this project where we aim to develop the next step beyond the current state-of-the-art, in synergy with the research in the ERC.

In addition to their market position as leader in delivering low-vibration systems, BlueFors has a well-established reputation in the community for reliable and trustworthy products and customer service. This is also support by Dr. Steele's direct experience with BlueFors, establishing a relationship of trust that will be an important cornerstone for implementing such a project, in which BlueFors will act as an active participating partner in the ERC research.

TITLE.P: Cryo-free dilution refrigerator with the maximum level of vibration isolation
